medicines.name: Amoxicillin 500mg
medicines.details: Take twice daily after meals for 7 days. Complete the full course even if symptoms improve.

medicines.name: Cough Syrup
medicines.details: Take 5ml three times daily after meals.

title: Complete Blood Count
details:
Hemoglobin: 14.2 g/dL (Normal)
WBC Count: 11,500/μL (Slightly High)
Platelets: 250,000/μL (Normal)

medicines.name: Paracetamol 500mg
medicines.details: Take as needed for fever or pain. Maximum 3 times daily.

medicines.name: Ibuprofen 200mg
medicines.details: Take one tablet after food, twice daily.

title: Blood Sugar Test
details:
Fasting Blood Sugar: 110 mg/dL (Slightly High)
HbA1c: 5.6% (Normal)
Recommendation: Follow up in 3 months.

medicines.name: Omeprazole 20mg
medicines.details: Take once daily before breakfast for 14 days.

medicines.name: Antacid Syrup
medicines.details: Take 10ml when needed for stomach discomfort.

title: Liver Function Test
details:
ALT: 45 U/L (Normal)
AST: 50 U/L (Slightly High)
Bilirubin: 0.9 mg/dL (Normal)

medicines.name: Cetirizine 10mg
medicines.details: Take one tablet at night before bed.

medicines.name: Nasal Spray
medicines.details: Use one spray per nostril twice daily.

title: Thyroid Function Test
details:
TSH: 3.1 µIU/mL (Normal)
T3: 1.4 ng/mL (Normal)
T4: 8.7 µg/dL (Normal)

medicines.name: Clotrimazole Cream
medicines.details: Apply twice daily to affected area for 10 days.

medicines.name: Cefixime 200mg
medicines.details: Take one tablet twice daily for 7 days.

title: Urine Routine Examination
details:
Color: Yellow
pH: 6.0
Protein: Negative
Glucose: Negative
Microscopy: Normal
